title: EP 82: Colors-Rapper MO3 Victim Of Gang War
itunes:title: EP 82: Colors-Rapper MO3 Victim Of Gang War
description:
In this special episode we address the murder of Dallas star MO3 and the real story of the gang war that claimed the life of the rising young rapper with Texas OG now activist Charleston Blue White. We also discuss the 12 un-reported murders that have occurred that are possibly all connected.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
